column2: nothing special. I was surprised at the line at Jinya as I found the food to be pretty subpar and flavorless
column3: as well as expensive. My fianc√©e and I came here for dinner and it was nothing to write home about. We got the ahi tuna tacos which were cute but just tiny bites
